sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached in S. Andrew's Church, Dublin, on the 5th of November, 1698. Being the anniversary thanksgiving for the deliverance from the Gun-Powder-Treason plot, in England, in the year 1605. Before the honourable the House of Commons. / By Mr. William Jephson, Dean of Lismore. Jephson, William, Dean of Lismore, fl. 1698.
[2], 3-16 p.
Printed by Andrew Crook, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty ..., Dublin : M DC XC VII [1698]
Title within double-line border. Order to print dated: Lunæ 7⁰ die Novembris, 1698. Signed: Tho. Tilson Cler. Parl. Dom. Com. Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library.
=======
